articles.title: SC measles outbreak has gone berserk: 124 cases since Friday, 409 quarantined - Ars Technica
articles.description: On Jan. 6, there were 211 cases. The outbreak, which began in October, is now at 434.

articles.title: S&P 500 books back-to-back losses as tech sells off, Bank of America slides after earnings: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The three major averages fell for a second consecutive session.
articles.content:
Stocks fell on Wednesday for a second session, pulling back further from record levels, as traders digested a fresh batch of earnings and monitored geopolitical developments.

articles.title: US announces start of phase two of Trump's Gaza peace plan - BBC
articles.description: It includes the establishment of a technocratic Palestinian government, as well as the reconstruction and demilitarisation of Gaza, US envoy Steve Witkoff says.
articles.content:
Phase two of the peace plan should see reconstruction starting in Gaza after two years of war
